hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks on the chart to help us solve.

We can put our two numbers together on the place value chart.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/55c99df4130ebf7d1298062888cab61fa5ae0bd9)

There are $7\text{ hundreds}, 8\text{ tens}$ and $14\text{ ones}$.

Now we can take our $14\text{ ones}$ and make $1\text{ ten}$ and $4\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5d36a7c353b1cbb8302eac572b9f4b6cbe8ee022)

In all, there are $7\text{ hundreds}, 9\text{ tens}$ and $4\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/9d10ddb4651815840b7eca5d0c349b4b5f29bf51)

$700 + 90+ 4= 794$
